title: epaper watchface minimal
summary: A clean, minimal e-paper style analog watchface.
description: A clean e-paper style watchface. Modern yet classy. Looks great on both round and square watches.Configurable - go for the full experience with dial markings and date display or opt for the super minimal look.Configure: 1. Dial markings2. Date display3. Show/hide dial markings when dimmedNeeds Android Wear 5.0+Minimal battery consumption and optimized!Disclaimer: This application is provided as-is and is not guaranteed to work on future devices. Please try out all features on your watch as soon as you buy. Thank you!
descriptionHTML:
A clean e-paper style watchface. Modern yet classy. Looks great on both round and square watches.

Configurable - go for the full experience with dial markings and date display or opt for the super minimal look.

Configure:
1. Dial markings
2. Date display
3. Show/hide dial markings when dimmed

Needs Android Wear 5.0+
Minimal battery consumption and optimized!

Disclaimer: This application is provided as-is and is not guaranteed to work on future devices. Please try out all features on your watch as soon as you buy. Thank you!
recentChanges: Major bug fix - watch was not updating when interactive.
